## Oh no u mean we can also do like code in this thing

See the .rmd file in  `jekyll/_rmd`


## a table

```{r}
options(digits = 3)
knitr::kable(head(mtcars))
```

## a yno ggplot

```{r}
library(ggplot2)
ggplot(mtcars, aes(x=wt, y=mpg))+
	geom_point()
```

## toggling code visibility
```{r, toggle=TRUE}
now_u_see_me <- seq(100)
```
